entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
